definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: The chapter 5 expounds the implementation technology of Mongolian editor control.
sentences.chinese: 第五章阐述了蒙文编辑控件的实现技术。

sentences.english: Automatic skew detection method of Mongolian document images.
sentences.chinese: 蒙文文本图像的自动倾斜检测。

sentences.english: Mr. Meng Wentong is an unmatched master of Sinology in 20th Century China.
sentences.chinese: 蒙文通先生是中国二十世纪卓尔不群的国学大师。

sentences.english: This text describes the current situation of the Mongolian newspaper in — depth reporting of the inner Mongol area emphatically.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重论述了内蒙古地区蒙文报纸深度报道现状。

sentences.english: The last part of the paper listed the Universal Standard Code for the Mongolian Script.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给出了蒙文毕业证样本国际标准码的编码表。

sentences.english: Mr. Meng devoted his life to traditional Chinese learning, particularly in Confucianism.
sentences.chinese: 蒙文通先生一生研治传统学术，于儒家学说钻研尤深。

sentences.english: Layout analysis method of Mongolian document images.
sentences.chinese: 蒙文文本图像的版面分析。

sentences.english: This work is to design an automatic classifier of the Mongolian language and bring to bear it.
sentences.chinese: 本文的工作是设计并实现一个蒙文文本自动分类器。

sentences.english: Meng Wentong inherits and develops Liao Ping's thoughts of Jing Xue.
sentences.chinese: 蒙文通的经学思想承廖平而来并加以发展。
学校的孩子上课用蒙文。

sentences.english: The chapter 4 expounds the main project of design of Mongolian editor control.
sentences.chinese: 第四章阐述了蒙文编辑控件的总体设计方案。

sentences.english: Research and realization of Mongolian letter segmentation method.
sentences.chinese: 蒙文字母切分方法的研究与实现。

definition: Chinese written language/Chinese literature esp. as taught abroad
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia
Syriac language (from c. 2nd century BC)/the Syriac script
